resume: Two friends who live near the Murrumbidgee River that wind up fighting in the Second Boer War for the New South Wales Lancers. It includes a charge at Majuba Hill , and a triumphant return to Sydney.  This was arguably the first Australian war film.Andrew Pike and Ross Cooper, Australian Film 1900–1977: A Guide to Feature Film Production, Melbourne: Oxford University Press, 1998,23
